name: Sucked Into The VCR
description:
Welcome to Sucked Into The VCR, a first person escape the room esque game! 

As the name suggests, you (a fat middle aged man living in the groovy 80's) has been sucked into the tacky VCR set he bought at a nearby second-hand store. You find that in this ghastly synth-wave purgatory, time keeps rewinding itself at shortening intervals. Who knows how long you have before you find yourself stuck in a rewind loop for the rest of eternity...

To escape, you must find the holy cassette tape and its accompanying tape player, battling against not only the distortions of this VCR hell, but time itself!

CONTROLS

MOVEMENT - W A S D

SPRINT - SHIFT

REMOTE FIRE - LMB

RELOAD - R

THROW HELD OBJECTS - RMB

GRAB OBJECTS - E (hold)

OBJECTIVE LOCATOR - Q (15 second time penalty)

Notes 

- 16:9 aspect ratio seems to be the only mode that displays correctly. Even though unity promises that other aspect ratios work, they do not

- Any feedback on gameplay functionality/general comments would be greatly appreciated! Although this is just a short game jam, we hope to learn as much as we can from this experience 

- The mouse will tend to appear on screen, this is fixed by tabbing in and out of the game

Made by Damian Crow and Hugo Davies
